snippet: The Foreign Ministry announced that it would postpone a summit meeting of Central and Eastern European countries because many leaders planned to boycott it to protest the treatment of an opposition leader.
abstract: Ukrainian Foreign Ministry announces that it will postpone a summit meeting of the Central and Eastern European countries because many leaders plan to boycott it to protest the treatment of Yulia V Tymoshenko; Tymoshenko, an opposition leader, has been imprisoned since October.
lead_paragraph: The Foreign Ministry announced that it would postpone a summit meeting of Central and Eastern European countries because many leaders planned to boycott it to protest the treatment of an opposition leader.
